text: Davyd Vazhaevich Zhvania (; ; 20 July 1967 – 9 May 2022) was a Ukrainian politician. He was a member of the Verkhovna Rada from 2002 until 2014. He was also the Emergency Minister of Ukraine for a short time in 2005. He was born in Tbilisi, then-Georgia SSR. Zhvania was shot and killed on 9 May 2022 during the Russian invasion in the Zaporizhzhia Oblast, Ukraine at the age of 54.Экс- нардеп Жвания погиб во время обстрела — Геращенко ==References== Category:1967 births Category:2022 deaths Category:Members of the Verkhovna Rada
title: Davyd Zhvania
